abstracts.cdata!:
The Second Reconstruction Program
            Project will, over a nine-month period finance the
            importation of agricultural inputs, spare parts and raw
            materials for industry and transport and other largely
            non-capital needs of high economic priority. It will support
            the Government's recovery program, in particular by:
            (a) increasing agricultural exports and domestic production
            in high priority areas; and (b) strengthening the
            Government's capacity to formulate and implement
            policies and programs in the following critical areas: (i)
            the planning and budgeting of foreign exchange; (ii) the
            pricing and marketing of export crops; (iii) the parastatal
            organizations; and (iv) external debt management.
